item.title: Parallelizing Random Forests in R
item.description: Recently Iâ€™ve been working on a project with the goal of understanding how students choose between course modalities (online or in-person). My goal so far has been to test a handful of models to come up with the most accurate way of predicting the likelihood that a student will take a course online. Hopefully, this best-performing model would offer some interpretability so that I can see which variables offer the most predictive power.
